entry.title: Tone: +Swarms of locusts '''infest''' roughly half of Madagascar, causing the country's worst locust outbreak in 60 years.
entry.summary:
+Swarms of locusts '''infest''' roughly half of Madagascar, causing the country's worst locust outbreak in 60 years.

← Previous revision Revision as of 12:34, 29 March 2013
Line 7: Line 7:
 
|alt = François Bozizé
  
|alt = François Bozizé
 
}}
  
}}
  +
{{*mp|March 26}} Swarms of [[locust]]s '''[[2013 Madagascar locust outbreak|infest]]''' roughly half of [[Madagascar]], causing the country's worst locust outbreak in 60 years.
 
{{*mp|March 25}} [[Hong Kong]]'s [[Court of Final Appeal (Hong Kong)|Court of Final Appeal]] '''[[Vallejos v. Commissioner of Registration|rules]]''' that [[Foreign domestic helpers in Hong Kong|foreign domestic workers]] are not allowed to become [[Hong Kong residents|Hong Kong permanent residents]].
  
{{*mp|March 25}} [[Hong Kong]]'s [[Court of Final Appeal (Hong Kong)|Court of Final Appeal]] '''[[Vallejos v. Commissioner of Registration|rules]]''' that [[Foreign domestic helpers in Hong Kong|foreign domestic workers]] are not allowed to become [[Hong Kong residents|Hong Kong permanent residents]].
 
{{*mp|March 24}} Rebels '''[[Central African Republic conflict (2012–present)#Fall of Bangui|capture]]''' [[Bangui]], the capital of the [[Central African Republic]], as President [[François Bozizé]] ''(pictured)'' flees the country.
  
{{*mp|March 24}} Rebels '''[[Central African Republic conflict (2012–present)#Fall of Bangui|capture]]''' [[Bangui]], the capital of the [[Central African Republic]], as President [[François Bozizé]] ''(pictured)'' flees the country.
 
{{*mp|March 20}} The [[2013 World Baseball Classic|World Baseball Classic]] concludes with the [[Dominican Republic national baseball team|Dominican Republic]] '''[[2013 World Baseball Classic – Championship|defeating]]''' [[Puerto Rico national baseball team|Puerto Rico]] in the final.
  
{{*mp|March 20}} The [[2013 World Baseball Classic|World Baseball Classic]] concludes with the [[Dominican Republic national baseball team|Dominican Republic]] '''[[2013 World Baseball Classic – Championship|defeating]]''' [[Puerto Rico national baseball team|Puerto Rico]] in the final.
 
{{*mp|March 20}} [[President of Bangladesh|Bangladeshi President]] '''[[Zillur Rahman]]''' dies in a Singapore hospital at the age of 84.
  
{{*mp|March 20}} [[President of Bangladesh|Bangladeshi President]] '''[[Zillur Rahman]]''' dies in a Singapore hospital at the age of 84.
−
{{*mp|March 18}} '''[[Bosco Ntaganda]]''', leader of the [[M23 (militia)|March 23 Movement]], surrenders to the U.S. embassy in Rwanda in response to an [[International Criminal Court]] indictment on war crimes.
  
   
 
</ul>
  
</ul>
